articleContent:
As the sound of the waves reverberates endlessly, civilization embarks on a new journey once again. As humanity rises anew from the ashes of the apocalypse, you, Rover, are poised for an adventure of Awakening. Wuthering Waves Closed Beta II Recruitment is now open!



✦Recruitment Period✦

2024/1/17 19:00 - 2024/2/7 02:00 (PT)



✦CBT2 Information✦

Test Type: Limited Closed Beta Test

Available Platforms: PC, Android, iOS

Start & End Dates: The official start and end dates for the test will be announced separately. Please stay tuned for further updates.



✦Qualification and Notification✦

1. To participate in CBT2, please visit the CBT2 recruitment page and log in to your Kuro Account. Click the "Apply" button to proceed with the CBT2 Recruitment Questionnaire.

>>>Link: https://wutheringwaves.kurogame.com/en/cbt

2. Please note that each Kuro Account can only submit the CBT2 Recruitment Questionnaire once. Once submitted, it cannot be edited.

3. The CBT2 qualification is only valid for this test, and all game data will be cleared after the test ends.

4. Once the recruitment is over, we will notify eligible participants who have qualified for CBT2 via email. You can also log in to the qualification inquiry page with your Kuro Account to check your qualification status. Please stay tuned for official updates regarding specific instructions for qualification distribution.

5. Upon obtaining the CBT2 qualification, you will receive a download and installation guide for the preferred platform you have chosen in the Recruitment Questionnaire. If you selected multiple platforms in the Questionnaire, you will be assigned to one of the platforms. A confirmation of the designated platform will be provided in the email containing the download and installation instructions.



✦Notes✦

1. All the game content in CBT2 is still under development and does not represent the final quality of the game.

2. Sharing, lending, giving away, transferring, or selling test qualifications, accounts, clients, and other related actions are strictly prohibited during CBT2. Any users found engaging in such behaviors will have their qualification canceled. To ensure the security of your personal information and assets, we remind you not to believe or engage in any activities related to sharing/trading of qualifications, account sharing/trading, or selling of test packages. This will help you avoid unnecessary losses.

3. CBT2 will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options.
articleTitle: Wuthering Waves Closed Beta II Recruitment Open!
